question: [File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/state_kv_pruner/mod.rs] [Function: prune()] [Slow shard pruner attack] Can a malicious or corrupted shard pruner intentionally slow down parallel execution on line 68, causing the entire pruning operation to hang and block database cleanup?
